applet_name: Twitter "Likes" saved to Day One
applet_description: A new liked tweet creates a Journal Entry in Day One with the tweet text, a single image, a link to the tweet, and @username.

applet_name: Spotify "Saved Track" saved to Day One
applet_description: A new saved track on Spotify creates a Journal Entry with track information and URL which auto-embeds the player in Day One.

applet_name: YouTube "Like" videos saved to Day One
applet_description: Like a video on YouTube creates a Journal Entry with a URL which auto-embeds the YouTube player in Day One.

applet_name: Spotify Saved Track to Day One Journal
applet_description: Any saved/liked tracks will be saved to your journal with album art, embedded player, and URL.

applet_name: Twitter "Tweets" saved to Day One
applet_description: Every new tweet you tweet creates a Journal Entry in Day One with the tweet text and a link to the tweet.

applet_name: Facebook "Status Update" saved to Day One
applet_description: Post a new status message creates a new Journal Entry in Day One.

applet_name: Strava Rides and Runs saved to Day One
applet_description: Log Rides and Runs to a Day One entry with detailed info, and link. (no Photo)

applet_name: Save your Instagram photos to Day One
applet_description: Automatically post your Instagram photos to a personal Day One Journal to expand upon these memories privately.

applet_name: Facebook "Photo Posts" saved to Day One
applet_description: Posting new photos posts on Facebook will create a new Journal Entry in Day One.

applet_name: IF screenshot THEN Day One
applet_description: To add screenshots to your Day One Journal

applet_name: 5 Minute Journal Entry Template at 6am everyday
applet_description: Creates a Day One journal entry using the 5 minute journal template

applet_name: Todoist "Completed Tasks" saved to Day One
applet_description: Save your completed tasks from Todoist as a new Journal Entry in Day On.

applet_name: Email an entry to Day One
applet_description: Email trigger@recipe.ifttt.com and auto generate a Day One entry with text and an attached photo.

applet_name: Today's Weather report saved to Day One
applet_description: At the time you specify, a new Day One journal will be created with the days weather report.

applet_name: Google Calendar Event Day One Entry
applet_description: Will create an entry in the chosen Day One journal 15 minutes before every event starts in Google Calendar.

applet_name: Foursquare Swarm "Check-in" saved to Day One
applet_description: Collect your check-in history to your Day One Journal.

applet_name: Evernote Note (with a specific tag) saved to Day One
applet_description: When you tag an Evernote note with a specific tag, a new Day One journal entry will be created.
applet_Trigger: Add a specific tag to note

applet_name: Pocket links saved to Day One
applet_description: Entry contains: title, description, link, tags and a photo if available.

applet_name: Fitbit daily activity summary saved to Day One
applet_description: A new Day One journal entry will be created when your daily activity summary is available from Fitbit.

applet_name: Reddit Save to Day One
applet_description: New saves are published to Day One

applet_name: Reddit Upvotes to Day One
applet_description: Save upvoted posts in Reddit as new entries in Day One.

applet_name: New iOS Contact to Day One Entry
applet_description: Will add an entry to Day One each time a new contact is created.

applet_name: Facebook "Tagged Photos" saved to Day One
applet_description: When you are tagged in a photo post on Facebook this Applet will create a new Journal Entry in Day One.
applet_Trigger: You are tagged in a photo

applet_name: Facebook "Link Post" saved to Day One
applet_description: Posting a new link creates a new Journal Entry in Day One.

applet_name: Instapaper links saved to Day One
applet_description: Any link added to Instapaper creates a new entry in Day One with, title, description, link, and tags.

applet_name: Automatically add the Quote of the Day to your DayOne journal
applet_description: Add a little flair to your daily journals — this Applet will make an entry with the QotD for you.

applet_name: Create a Day One entry when you take a photo
applet_description: Take a photo with you iPhone and it will create a new Day One journal entry. It only works with the back camera, and does not include screenshots. This should limit the unwanted shots from showing up.
applet_Trigger: New photo with the rear camera

applet_name: Quick Note to Day One with shareable link
applet_description: Quickly add a note with public URL to Day One.

applet_name: Strava Activity (with Photo) saved to Day One
applet_description: Log Rides and Runs (that include a photo) save to a Day One entry with detailed info, link, and single photo.
applet_Trigger: New activity by you with photo

applet_name: Instapaper "Like" saves Link to Day One
applet_description: An entry is saved with title, description, and URL.

applet_name: Save your Pocket favorites to Day One
applet_description: As you favorite stories in pocket, they'll save to a notebook in Day One - useful for remembering "great reads"

applet_name: At the end of each Day, log recent Spotify tracks in Day One
applet_description: A simple applet that gets your most recent plays in Spotify then records them as a journal entry in Day One. Want to see exactly what you were listening to on the same day last year? From now on you'll be able to!

applet_name: IF mentioned on Twitter THEN journal
applet_description: If you are mentioned on Twitter, save the mention to your Day One journal

applet_name: RescueTime Daily Summary saved to Day One
applet_description: Includes total time tracked, productive, neutral and distracting, and a link to the full report on RescueTime.

applet_name: Create a Day One entry containing an album cover collage of last.fm scrobbles for the last week
applet_description: Replace XXX in the Body and Image URL fields with your last.fm username
applet_Trigger: Every day of the week at

applet_name: Medium article to Day One Journal
applet_description: Like a Medium article? Save it in your journal!

applet_name: New Google Contact to Day One Entry
applet_description: This recipe will add every new Google Contact to your Day One journal

applet_name: Save your Wordpress posts to Day One
applet_description: Automatically save your wordpress entries to Day One

applet_name: RescueTime Highlight saved to Day One
applet_description: Daily Highlight text posted immediately.

applet_name: Keep your Instapaper highlights 4ever!
applet_description: Like highlighting interesting passages while you're reading? Hate losing them or not being able to search them? This recipe has you covered!

applet_name: Instagram pics with hashtag #journal saved to Day One
applet_description: Add some visual flair to your journal. When you add the hashtag #journal to your Instagram caption, it'll tell this Applet this one's a keeper. It'll be added to Day One along with the caption (with the hashtag stripped out).
applet_Trigger: New photo by you with specific hashtag

applet_name: Spotify to Day One Journal
applet_description: This will help you remember when you first added a song to your playlist.
applet_Trigger: New track added to a playlist

applet_name: Starava Activities
applet_description: Strava Activities to DayOne

applet_name: Evernoteのメモを「Day One」へ
applet_description: Evernoteのメモを「Day One」へ。タイトルは文字化けするため、英数字と記号のみが望ましい。

applet_name: Save Liked Video to Day One
applet_description: Heart a video on Vimeo creates a Journal Entry with video information and URL which auto-embeds the Vimeo player in Day One.

applet_name: instagramで動画を投稿したら「Day One」へ
applet_description: instagramで動画を投稿したら「Day One」へ

applet_name: SoundCloud liked songs journal
applet_description: Create journal entry when like a public song on SoundCloud

applet_name: Save tweets to DayOne Journal
applet_description: All tweets sent by specified account will be saved to DayOne Journal

applet_name: Android Outgoing Phone to Day One
applet_description: Creates a journal entry for all outgoing phone calls from Android Device
